title: What is the best all day time table for students preparing for bank exams? - Quora

response.answer_text: A nice timetable must look like this. Quantitative aptitude — 1:30-2 hrs. Reasoning ability — 2-2:30 hrs. More time because topics like seating arrangement, puzzles, machine input are time consuming. English — 1-1:30 hrs. Give 30 mins to newspaper reading and rest of the time in practicing quizzes of exam oriented topics. General awareness — 30-45 mins. Daily news and some static gk on day wise basis. Computer is not there in every exam so, it can be started 15-20 days before the exam as the questions asked are not of very high level. This is a general division of time. One can extend or reduce it for any section according to the strength. All the best !!

It does not how much time you study! What matters is the quality of your studies. Whenever you study, study with concentration and focus and don't mug up. Understand the concepts rather than mugging up
